resources.string:
The app uses the nearby connections permission to look for and connect to nearby devices. Without it, the app simply won’t work.\n\n
Be mindful, that using this permission the app will turn on Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. Wi-Fi and Bluetooth are the technologies responsible for this magic.

We need this permission to read any files that are sent from other players. Rest assured we won’t be snooping around other files unless you specifically request us to. \n\n
Also, any files you send to other devices can be intercepted and stolen. It goes without saying that you should not send sensitive data.
